affects:
ABILITY: Point Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc: Rock spikes burst from the earth along a straight path. Enemy units are hurled into the air, then are stunned and take damage when they fall.
notes:
The spikes move at 1600 units per second, over 700 range.
Impale cannot be blocked by Linken's Sphere.
cmb:
95/115/135/155
13
lore: All zealot scarabs possess intimate knowledge of underground pathways, using them to their advantage.
name: nyx_assassin_impale

affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Heroes
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc: Destroys the target hero's mana equal to a multiplier of its Intelligence, and deals damage equal to the mana burned.
cmb:
100
28/20/12/4
lore: The tome in Ultimyr describes one scarab with the ability eat away at the mind of lesser beings.
name: nyx_assassin_mana_burn

affects:
ABILITY: No Target
DAMAGE TYPE: Pure
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc:
When activated while above ground, Spiked Carapace reflects and negates damage dealt to Nyx Assassin (max once from each source), as well as stunning the source of the damage. Activating Spiked Carapace will not break Vendetta invisibility.
While Burrowed, Spiked Carapace instantly stuns nearby enemies when cast.
notes:
The damage is calculated after all reductions.
Spiked Carapace will only trigger on damage from other player controlled units.
cmb:
40/40/40/40
23/20/17/14
lore: While their carapace is relatively thin, it's guarded by a retractable field of razor-sharp spikes.
name: nyx_assassin_spiked_carapace

desc: Nyx Assasssin buries himself beneath the battlefield over 1 second. Once burrowed, Spiked Carapace instantly stuns nearby enemies when cast, the range of Mana Burn and Impale by is increased by 50%, and Impale's cooldown is decreased. While Burrowed, Nyx Assassin is stationary, unable to attack, and invisible. His health and mana regeneration are also increased, and he gains 40% damage reduction.
attrib:
BURROW HEALTH/MANA REGEN: 1.5%
BURROW DAMAGE REDUCTION: 40
BURROW MANA BURN RANGE: 900
BURROW IMPALE RANGE: 1050
BURROW IMPALE COOLDOWN: 9
BURROW SPIKED CARAPACE RANGE: 300
lore: Some castes of zealot scarab are known to create small burrows to lie in wait, ready to ambush their prey.
name: nyx_assassin_burrow

cmb: 0
lore: Some castes of zealot scarab are known to create small burrows to lie in wait, ready to ambush their prey.
name: nyx_assassin_unburrow

affects:
ABILITY: No Target
DAMAGE TYPE: Physical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
desc:
Allows Nyx Assassin to become invisible and gain a speed bonus. If Nyx Assassin attacks to break the invisibility, massive bonus damage is dealt with the attack.
Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
notes:
Has a 0 second fadetime.
If a spell is used to break the invisibility, or the invisibility expires, the bonus damage is lost.
cmb:
160/210/260
70/60/50
lore: The scarab kills for the glory of his queen.
name: nyx_assassin_vendetta
